snippet.title: Masters of Microsoft Licensing
snippet.content:
Phone:
1300 557 916
Pricing:
Early Bird Pricing $2,795 (Ends Friday the 18th of August) Full Price $2,995
Intensive 3-day Microsoft licensing training Course that is designed to provide you with a comprehensive knowledge of Microsoft licensing terms.
Presented by Discover SAM, this course will empower you to make informed licensing decisions that optimise spend, mitigate compliance risks and maximise your return on software investment. The knowledge you gain from this course will empower you to;
Make strategic and informed licensing decisions.
Make intelligent use of your existing licences.
Identify and mitigate compliance risks.
Maximise ROI by being aware of all the rights and benefits your licences provide.
Avoid the common mistakes that expose organisations to licence deficiencies.
Communicate confidently and effectively with your reseller and Microsoft.
Optimise spend by knowing what licences you need and the reasons why you need them.
Become your organisations in-house licensing expert!
Learn more and register at http://www.discoversam.com.au/microsoftlicensing/
